meanings.definition: An extra payment or gift given to an employee in addition to their regular pay.
meanings.sent1: Employees were thrilled to receive bonuses during the holiday season.
meanings.sent2: She worked hard all year and was rewarded with a generous bonus.
meanings.sent3: The office party was so fun, it felt like the bonuses were a cherry on top!
meanings.sent4: The bonuses rained down on the team, bringing smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent5: The bonuses were like golden tickets, bringing joy and excitement to the staff.

meanings.definition: Something extra or additional that is given as a reward or incentive.
meanings.sent1: Winning the competition came with exciting bonuses for the champions.
meanings.sent2: The company offered bonuses to motivate employees to reach their goals.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected bonuses made the hard work feel even more worthwhile.
meanings.sent4: The bonuses were like little surprises that made everyone happy.
meanings.sent5: The bonuses acted as a sweet treat, encouraging everyone to do their best.

meanings.definition: A sum of money added to a person's wages as a reward for good performance.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to the project earned him significant bonuses at the end of the year.
meanings.sent2: The bonuses were a reflection of the team's exceptional work ethic.
meanings.sent3: The bonuses felt like winning a jackpot without even playing the lottery!
meanings.sent4: The bonuses were like shining stars in the sky, rewarding hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The bonuses were a beacon of success, guiding employees towards excellence.
